summary: TAKATA RECALL. NOTIFIED CHEVROLET OF NB IN REGARDS TO RECALL THE PARTS HAVE NOT BEEN RELEASED TO REPLACE AIR BAGS. CALLED TAKATA IN REGARDS OF RECALL. THEY SUGGESTED I CALL GM IN REGARDS TO LOANER CAR UNTIL PARTS ARE AVAILABLE TO REPLACE AIR BAGS. THEY STATE CAR IS PERFECTLY SAFE TO DRIVE...NOT SURE I UNDERSTAND THIS SINCE IT IS A RECALL AND SEVERAL PEOPLE HAVE BEEN KILLED AND ARTICLE READS THAT VEHICLES ARE UNSAFE TO DRIVE...
